title: Requesting additional servings
context: Ask the server to bring more bread, water, or sides to the table.

content.bestLine: Can we get some more bread, please?

neutral.text: Can you bring us more fries?
I'd like some more salad, please.
Can we get a refill on the sides?
We're out of bread, can we get more?

informal.text: Hey, can we get more bread?
We're out of water, can you grab us some more?
Can you hook us up with more fries?
I'm starving, can we get more food?
Can you bring us another round of drinks?
We need more snacks, can you grab some?
Can you get us some more dessert?
We're still hungry, can we get more food?

formal.text: Could you please bring us more bread?
We would appreciate it if you could refill our water.
May we have some additional sides, please?
Could you kindly bring us more condiments?
We would like to request more drinks, please.
Could you please bring us another round of appetizers?
